caption: Pablo Picasso (1881–1973; born Malaga, Spain; died Mougins, France; active Paris), Chute de Phaeton avec le char de soleil (Fall of Phaeton with the Chariot of the Sun)   (from Ovid, "Les Metamorphoses" Livre II), 1930. Etching; printed from cancelled copper plate, with remarques, in black ink; watermark:  Rives; 31.2 x 22.3 cm (plate), 32.3 x 25 cm (sheet). Anonymous gift (x1977-44)
